original_text: bearing with one another and, if one has a complaint against another, forgiving each other; as the Lord has forgiven you, so you also must forgive.
korean_text: 누가 누구에게 불만이 있거든 서로 용납하여 피차 용서하되 주께서 너희를 용서하신 것 같이 너희도 그리하고

sentences.original_text: and if one has a complaint against another
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 다른 사람에 대해 불만이 있을지라도

sentences.original_text: as the Lord has forgiven you
